categories: Category:Events during the Early rebellion against the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Tocan system extraction was an operation during the history of the Rebel Alliance. During the action, the U-wing served in a gunship role. The UT-60D's role in the extraction was noted in a report from General Antoc Merrick to Commander-in-Chief Mon Mothma and was included in The Rebel Files.
The extraction is mentioned in the 2017 in-universe reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, written by Daniel Wallace.
